ygData.subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Spells?
ygData.msgSnippet: They re amusing... Halo of Light summons a head piece that acts as a light source.  I think it s no drop, but I m not sure. Gaze is a zoom-in spell to make
ygData.messageBody:
They're amusing...

Halo of Light summons a head piece that acts as a
light source. I think it's no drop, but I'm not sure.

Gaze is a "zoom-in" spell to make far away things
closer. It just blows them up and makes them blurry
and ugly...I guess it might not be as bad at high
screen res.

They're amusing, I guess. And they're not nukes, so
they give you a little variety. But they're not as
much fun as, say, Eye of Zomm (one of the greatest
spells ever! <G>)

Barnabas,
The Great Wizzard

--- John Pool <jpool10550@...> wrote:
> I went to buy my 12 Lvl spells and couldnt find Halo
> of light or Gaze
> in Neriak. Are they there and what do they do? Are
> they much help?
>
>
>
